caseTitle: Feroze Ahmed Jamali v. Masroor Ahmad Khan Jatoi & others
tagline: Election Tribunal has given no reason to reject the report of NADRA. It is clear and unmistakable that 2,147 used counterfoils had invalid NIC numbers. Since the votes to be excluded are greater in number than the winning margin, this would materially affect the result of the election, thereby bringing the case within the purview of Section 70 of the Representation of People Act, 1976, warranting declaration of the election to be void as a whole.
